## utils.math.toRadians() function

Converts degrees to radians. Copied from Closure's goog.math.toRadians.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toRadians(angleDegrees: number): number;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  angleDegrees | number | Angle in degrees. |
